name: texture wave
desc: The texture_wave module utilizes opacity and texture mapping to create an animated effect. This module works with both OpenGL and Software Rendering.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Mode
properties.desc: The Mode allows the user to determine how the phase affects the texture of the line.

properties.name: Phase
properties.desc: The Phase slider allows you to control the current position of the oscillation.

properties.name: Phase Loop
properties.desc: The Phase Loop controls the method for animating the change through the phase values.

properties.name: Number Of Steps
properties.desc: The Number Of Steps determines the length of the animation.

properties.name: Texture Resolution
properties.desc: Texture Resolution is the internal resolution of the image used for texture-coloring.

properties.name: Minimum Amplitude
properties.desc: Min Amplitude is the minimum opacity of the objects.

properties.name: Maximum Amplitude
properties.desc: Max Amplitude is the maximum opacity of the objects.

properties.name: Contrast
properties.desc: Contrast affects the contrast (similar to color saturation).
